title: All the President's Signatures: Biden's Autopen Gamble
description: On a Sunday morning talk show in July 2020, Bernie Sanders said the quiet part out loud. Joe Biden, he told CBS’s Face the Nation, had been “a more conservative senator than he is as...
content: On a Sunday morning talk show in July 2020, Bernie Sanders said the quiet part out loud. Joe Biden, he told CBS’s Face the Nation, had been “a more conservative senator than he is as president.” Side… [+7627 chars]
